Advance Unit Lupicia:
Did you learn more about the Fafurion Temple?
This place is different from other areas in Aden. It was under the sea until recently.
However, the greatest difference is that the monsters here are Fafurion's minions that he personally bestowed power upon.
The mere sight of these horrible creatures could strike fear into the entire continent.
Their presence itself confirms how difficult it will be to suppress Fafurion. But I believe we can exert greater power when facing stronger enemies. Am I right?
